articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: American Airlines pilots approve new contract that includes big pay raises - New York Post
articles.description: Airline unions are enjoying leverage to get big pay raises because a boom in travel is lifting airline revenue.
articles.content:
American Airlines pilots have approved a new contract that will raise their pay about 41% over four years, their union said Monday.
The Allied Pilots Association said that 73% of pilots who took par… [+2151 chars]

articles.author: Andy Rose, Alisha Ebrahimji
articles.title: A Californian was killed after an argument over a Pride flag hanging outside her clothing store, deputies say - CNN
articles.description: A Southern California clothing store owner was shot and killed after an argument about a rainbow Pride flag hanging outside her business, police said, as the LGBTQ+ community continues to face violence and threats across America.
